rows.label: tlk43500147_04_msg0001
rows.name:
My granddad said he met
King Serich once,
a long time ago.

rows.label: tlk43500147_04_msg0002
rows.name:
You've heard of him, right?
The king of Luxuria?

rows.label: tlk43500147_04_msg0003
rows.name:
Anyway, it was a few decades ago.
The king was still young and free,
out traveling the world.

rows.label: tlk43500147_04_msg0004
rows.name:
My grandad asked him what he thought
of Invidia. He said he was a little
disappointed with the lack of salvaging.

rows.label: tlk43500147_04_msg0005
rows.name:
Seems the king was a bit of a salvager
freak back in the day.

rows.label: tlk43500147_04_msg0006
rows.name:
Yeah, he's quite a treasure hoarder
from what I hear.
